name: Me vs. Halloween
description:
WARNING: the web version is less stable than the desktop one. If the game is working bad, download it!

W A S D --> Walk

ESC --> Detach mouse

Mouse movement --> Look at

Left mouse button --> Hit / Pick up

Q --> Drop / Pick up shield

E --> Drop / Pick up weapon

P --> Pause

You are called by the mayor to destroy all the monsters that haunt your city!

Destroy 'em all and take the key to open the door.

Every monster has a weakness; it's up to you to find out where!

Take the moon as a reference; it will always point towards the end of the level.
